name: Vietnam For Teens - 9 days

reviews.review: This was my first tour and I wasn't sure what to expect. I think that our tour guide Kien made the trip amazing. He was clear and concise, entertaining, and provided lots of useful information. I enjoyed his talks about Vietnam history, culture, and people. He was always so helpful. I felt like he was taking very good care of us throughout the entire trip. I can't say enough about Kien! As for the itinerary, there were two days of travel that I found tiring. One was the overnight train sleeper train ride to Hue. It's not easy for me to sleep on a train with three other people in the same berth. Still, I am glad I tried it as now I can say that I've done it. Plus, the people in my cabin were lovely and nice. There was one day when we had to wake up at 330 am to catch a plane to Ho Chi Minh City. The trip notes referred to this as "an early morning flight to Ho Chi Minh City." I guess it didn't sink in just how tiring that day would be. After the flight, we took a three hour bus ride to the Mekong Delta. If you add up the time spent waiting in the airport and the time sitting on the plane, I think we must have sat for at least 8 hours that day. I am normally a very active person and one thing I found difficult about this tour was getting enough exercise. I felt like we sat a lot of the time, e.g. on a tour bus, at the restaurants, on boats, on a plane, on the train, etc. Having said all this, I don't know how I could have seen all the things that I was able to see in 10 days. I really felt like I saw Vietnam on this trip. And I also felt that the tour was well organized, all except for the first and last hotel. We weren't told which hotel we would stay at in Ho Chi Minh so I could not book my hotel for the next day (we stayed an extra day) with knowledge of where we would be moving from. I also did not know the first hotel until much closer to the tour date. By then, I had already booked a hotel in Hanoi in the centre of town. TOURRADAR will book additional nights stays before and after the tour in the tour hotel but I found the cost to be much higher than what I was able to find on BOOKING.COM. All in all, I give this tour a five star rating because I don't think much can be improved given the itinerary. One additional comment - it was an unexpected joy to get a pair of pants tailored in Hoi An. I wish I had scoured magazines for pictures of clothes that I like in advance to have them ready when I arrived. I chose to get pants tailored only at the last minute and was pleased with the results. So inexpensive and the pants fit perfectly! It's best to order the clothes on the first day to have time to make adjustments if adjustments are needed.

Guides were great. Airport pick up at Saigon not there and phone number supplied did not work from my UK phone. Had to ask another tour rep to phone. 3 hotels were very good,Saigon hotel was adequate and clean. Tours were very good.

This trip included most of the highlights of Vietnam and Cambodia. It was stress free due to everything being organised efficiently. The pace was good and provision was made for people struggling with the more strenuous parts. There is quite a lot of walking on rough terrain. The guides were knowledgeable, helpful and friendly. The hotels are good or very good. The coaches were good. Food was good with non spicy options for the less adventurous in the group. Vietnam and Cambodia, especially, have lots of litter, motorbikes and smelly bits along with magnificent tourist attractions. We normally go solo but an "On The Go" tour of this part of the world had the benefits of good guides and organisation. We are pleased we chose them.

name: Ho Chi Minh City - Mekong Delta - Cu Chi Tunnels 4 Days 3 Nights

reviews.review: We did 3 day tour of Ho Chi Minh City, Mekong Delta, CuChi Tunnels.  Accomodation was great, guides were excellent especially Long on the Mekong Delta Tour.  The only disappointment was the itinerary indicated the first day included a tour of Ho Chi Minh City but when we contacted the Tour Operator they told us we needed to book this ourselves.  I have reviewed the brochure and it definitely indicates this is included even down to describing in detail the itinerary for the tour of the city on Cyclo.  In the end we organised a tour through the hotel and felt like we were ripped off by that tour operator.  We think you need to discuss this with Vietnam Adventure Tours and amend your brochure to make it clear it is not an inclusion.

The hotel was in a great location, and the tour was everything we hoped for. The day trips to the Mekong Delta, War Museum and Cu Chi Tunnels were insightful and enjoyable. What really made our days great was the vibrant and friendly personalities of our two tour guides - Mr. Handsome and Ms. Bunny. They really made our stay in Saigon a memorable experience.

While the tour was for 3 consecutive days The guide and group were different each day. The company arranged for an extra night accommodation and airport pick up and drop off. Extremely easy to work with. Punctual, flexible and approachable. Totally reliable. The first tour was the cyclo around the city. This also included art centre and souvenir shops which, like alot of Vietnam especially the markets there is a lot of pressure to buy something. It was fun I don't remember the guides name but she was kind and knowledgeable. The next day was the highlight of the tour. The Mekong Delta the guide was Vu and she was awesome. Her English was perfect.,her style easy friendly fun with an excellent sense of humour approachable, organised related to everyone in the group even with diversity in cultures. Loved it. Would recommend this tour. Day 3 was CuChi tunnels with Ken, again a well organised, run informative tour, another great day and guide.
Well organised, informative.friendly.

name: Vietnam Superior Tour Package 18Days/17Nights

reviews.review:
This trip went beyond our expectations!We were collected and delivered promptly politely and safely throughout the 16 days"Our local guides were all very different with a different skill set at each location which made for an interesting and never boring tour.We joined a group only in Hanoi one day a different group for 10 cabins on the boat at Halong Bay and a different group of 10 people in HCMC for the Mekong Delta tip so we never felt "stuck "or "trapped
When we decided 4 days in Nga Trang may be too long as we live on the beach at home your company organised a private tour to Dalat in the mountains.Likewise again at short notice we went on a private tour from Hanoi to Bac Ha and then Sappa.All sso very interesting and all so easy!!!

Thank you so much for your help on our trip. We had a lovely time. We loved Hanoi, our guides were friendly, funny and well informed. We liked the lunch restaurant in Hanoi and they sent us away with a huge amount of food for our son who slept through lunch!  The only thing we wished we would have made time for was exploring/ shopping in the Old Quarter.  The children lived the water puppets and we all enjoyed the cyclo ride. The stay at the Sofutel was perfect- comfortable and family friendly.

The Ha Long bay cruise was amazing. The staff, service, and food in the boat were exceptional. The staff on the bait went above and beyond for our children and we appreciated their help and friendliness.

Our time in Saigon was nice as well, TinTin was a fantastic guide with a great sense of humour. We liked the day on the Mekong. We felt that the lunch restaurant was a little run down, the table clothes were dirty and the surrounding garden was junky- but the food was enjoyable. The hotel was ok- a little outdated and not to our standard of 5 star/ but we are greatly appreciative of your efforts to make our family comfortable and happy.

Our time at Angkor was perfect and our guide, Lei was kind enough to bring us for lunch straight away as the visa process was very long. Le Zmerufuem was s lovely choice and our stay was very comfortable- I would recommend other travellers to stay there.

Thank you again!

The tour we booked was absolutely excellent. The hotels, the guides, the restaurants & the tours were fantastic. Without question if we know of anyone going to Southeast Asia we will strongly recommend your Company.

name: Sapa 3 Days 2 Nights Trekking Tour From Hanoi (2 Nights in Hotel)

reviews.review: We really enjoyed the trekking in Sa Pa! Such a great experience. The town is quite nice and seeing the traditional people and learning about their way of life was interesting. The only thing I could suggest for the tour to be slightly better would be to include another activity instead of having so much free time as there is not much to do in the town. Thank you Vietnam Travel Top!

Amazing Sapa tour!
we had a 3 day/2 night trip from Hanoi and are so happy we did.
Our guide for the trekking, Su Linh, was delightful. Time was just a little bit short for us for more photos but we really enjoyed it. The food was great, the people were super friendly and we hung out all night before going to sleep in a nice loft.
We will definitely come back here again.

Fabulous scenery. Good food. Hotel good standard with very helpful staff. Good coordination on the ground. 
More suited to independent travelers, this tour isn’t an intact group, you will meet up with people on other tours / schedules which has pluses and minuses. You will have quite a lot of free time on your own (massages, shopping, exploring the town) 

Some negatives: 
We lost our guide in Cat Cat Village and had to make our own way back to Sapa. That meant I had to get on the back of a motorcycle, which I had no intention of doing. 

During our walk to the villages on day 2, some of the local Hmong ladies had walked to Sapa that morning and walked with us back to their village. While I did appreciate the help on some of the difficult parts of the walk and to avoid slipping, I did feel obligated to buy goods from 2 of them when we arrived at their village. A 3rd lady began pressing for sales too which really made the whole experience feel like a shakedown. I had no problem giving them money as a thank you but this felt forced and excessive. 

I did ask to be brought back early, to bus that brought us back to Sapa, to get a seat near front. It ended up that the bus was waiting for me approx 20mins late by the time I was dropped off.

Our Sapa tour was fantastic, it was a great mix of culture food and activities. The views in Sapa are fantastic and the Hmong people are lovely. Leon Dao (Dao Huu Luan) was very responsive to my calls and emails, and i appreciated his excellent customer service. I would highly recommend this tour as a great adventure to Sapa Hills.

I had a very touch and go experience with this tour. I arrived off the bus not knowing where I was supposed to go and basically having to orchestrate the whole 3 days myself. It did not feel as if I was able to relax a great deal. The hotel was half-decent and the restaurant lacked something to be desired (it was dirty and some of the food was cold when it should have been hot). Leon, however, was somewhat helpful and met my requests after I gave reasons why I was making them. I was not originally going to stay in a home stay according to Leon, but he made it happen for me and it was one of the best experiences I’ve had while in Vietnam. That being said, considering the price, I would not buy a package next time and would simply have organized everything myself knowing what I do now.

Vietnam Travel Top ensured our recent trip to Vietnam ran smoothly. The entire trip was planned through Ms. Kathy and was spot on perfect. From prompt email responses to outstanding customer care, perfectly coordinated transfers and day trips. Completely professional and friendly, it was the most perfect get away. Thank you for making this a memorable trip.

Vietnam Travel Top, Mr John, , organised some very interesting tours for us when we recently visited Vietnam. He is a wonderful tour organiser and came up with some great ideas for places to see and things to do. He was very patient with our requests and questions.  I'll say he did a wonderful job in settling the Vietnam tour for us. He is an asset to his company.

we joined tour to Sapa 3 days 2 nights organized by Vietnam Travel Top, which was really amazing. Everything is well-prepared, from clean bus with good driver. Su Linh was our guide and her English was excellent. Trekking road is nice with up and down, pass through mountain, stream, bamboo forest .. local guides helped me much in difficult road, and they were really care about our safety. Thank you Su Linh for everything.

name: Vietnam in Depth - 19 Days

reviews.review:
Vietnam in depth - a great tour



Overall a great experience! All transfers and guided tours on time. Guides very nice and professional. Would be even better if drivers were English speaking as well! A good feeling to have everything booked and not have to travel "in a big group". Hotels satisfactory. Some small changes in the excursions that we were not informed of!

Vietnam in depth - a great tour
Overall a great experience! All transfers and guided tours on time. Guides very nice and professional. Would be even better if drivers were English speaking as well! A good feeling to have everything booked and not have to travel "in a big group". Hotels satisfactory. Some small changes in the excursions that we were not informed of!

SUPER planned program and all carried out accordingly
Dear Legend Travel
We want to send you our biggest thanks for an extraordinary fine travel experience and very well-planned itinerary. We carry along so many good memories from your very nice country - your beautiful nature, culture, history and great hospitality and positive mindset.
Best regards Poul and Anne-Marie

name: Hanoi Culinary Experience

reviews.review: I had a great time. The cycling tour in Vietnam was very well organized and conducted. Our guide was knowledgeable, friendly and personal. The crew were very helpful. They all made the trip enjoyable. The only comment is that Tour radar describes the experience, if I remember right, that it is appropriate for any level but it could actually be challenging for older or less fit persons. That being said, electric supported bikes were made available to a couple bikers otherwise they may have had difficulty keeping up.

name: Highlight Vietnam Tour plus Phu Quoc Island - 20 Days

reviews.review:
Thank you so much for your help on our trip. We had a lovely time. We loved Hsnoi, our guides were friendly, funny and well informed. We liked the lunch restaurant in Hanoi and they sent us away with a huge amount of food for our son who slept through lunch!  The only thing we wished we would have made time for was exploring/ shopping in the Old Quarter.  The children lived the water puppets and we all enjoyed the cyclo ride. The stay at the Sofutel was perfect- comfortable and family friendly.

The Ha Long bay cruise was amazing. The staff, service, and food in the boat were exceptional. The staff on the bait went above and beyond for our children and we appreciated their help and friendliness.

Our time in Saigon was nice as well, TinTin was a fantastic guide with a great sense of humour. We liked the day on the Mekong. We felt that the lunch restaurant was a little run down, the table clothes were dirty and the surrounding garden was junky- but the food was enjoyable. The hotel was ok- a little outdated and not to our standard of 5 star/ but we are greatly appreciative of your efforts to make our family comfortable and happy.

Our time at Angkor was perfect and our guide, Lei was kind enough to bring us for lunch straight away as the visa process was very long. Le Zmerufuem was s lovely choice and our stay was very comfortable- I would recommend other travellers to stay there.

Thank you again!

name: 7 Days South to Central of Vietnam

reviews.review: Thank you to our guides who provided a personal touch and perspective to the beautiful country of Vietnam.

Scooter tour in Saigon was great but got sick from ice in my beer at the seafood restaurant my fault was told no ice outside hotel or majour resturant . So cant rate Da Nang was in bed. LOVE HOI AN like eveyone else easy to get around see and do stuff.  Hotels 3 starrs except Da Nang would give it 2 only ok pay the upgrade to 4 you get a pool to lie around. I would stick to the 10 DAY TOUR . I dont think 7 is enough to get you into the culture. Was told al transfers paid for but the last one was a cab and he wouldn't go untill i paid he followed me into the Airport' i told him him ring Hoi An Tour but he said no english as they do when ripping you off bet he got paid twice
What a fantastic and great trip! Thanks Huyen Anh, and Tin that were my fearless and amazing tour guides. I highly recommend this Tourradar. Transportation was always flawless and very punctual.
nice country, nice people, good organization of the trip

name: Real Vietnam

reviews.review:
The Real Vietnam tour was brilliant! There was a nice mix of learning about Vietnams history and culture and experiencing its night life. You have to be willing to have the long nights with the early mornings sometimes to get a full experience
The tour leader,Tan, was brilliant. H e had so much knowledge to share and has natural charisma that made him easy to get on with
5 Star Rating for this tour
Days were mostly well planned.
i like the tour guide Chieu le. He ia very helpful and always available for us. I especially like the optional bike tour in hoi an
Only 5 stars due to our guide, Chieu. There were some average moments and hotels but he made the trip worth it.
Overall experience was very positive with a planned itinerary but plenty of free time to do your own thing, and a great way to meet new people!
I loved our tour guide and the places we visited.Some of the hotels could have been better in terms of comfort (beds) and noise (Ho Chi Minh).
Hotels could be revised
Some hotels were poor - HCMC hotel was way too loud, Cat Ba had rock hard beds and Hanoi was too far from the old quarter.
Our tour leader, Ash, was amazing. She was very knowledgeable, helpful, funny and friendly, and made the trip thoroughly enjoyable.
I had an awesome time, both my tour leaders (Paek and Ashley) were amazing, and their english was incredible.

We had the most incredible trip to Vietnam. Although we booked a fairly basic tour the itinerary was full enough to keep us entertained whilst allowing for some needed rest and recuperation. We expected very basic hotels and were pleasantly surprised throughout. The transport between each of the locations was well organised and comfortable. What really made this trip unforgettable was our tour guide. His knowledge and love of Vietnam were clear throughout. He shared interesting stories about his family life and provided insight into life in his home country. Even on days that were scheduled as 'free time' our guide provided tips on what to see and where to go for meals which was a huge help. Quang is a huge asset to Gecko Tours and should be recognised for his dedication and hard work.

Absolutely best trip I could've asked for! This was my first time travelling by myself and it was incredible! I had an awesome bunch of people to travel with and a well-informed and enthusiastic tour guide, who didn't mind taking time out to show us the extra stuff along the way

name: Vietnam Experience

reviews.review: Great trip, we got to see a lot of Vietnam in a short space of time
Great tour guide,very helpful and a top bloke
Fantastic, Elle brought the trip to life with great knowledge of the local areas we travelled through. I can’t wait to go on another tour with Elle

Ele was an incredible tour leader. Her enthusiasm, positivity and love for Vietnam really came through. A tour leader really influences the overall experience of a group tour. Can’t say anything but great things about Ele!

Vietnam was amazing! In the 2-3 weeks I was there we covered so much. I’ll never forget the street food, Halong bay, mud fishing, riding around Hoi An... the list goes on! I will be going back one day! All this wouldn’t have been possible without the amazing trip manager Elle! She puts so much passion and energy into her job, she really loves Asia and is very well educated about everything. Elle makes it her number 1 priority for everyone to have fun and make the most of their trip. You can ask her anything at anytime and she will make sure to help! She’s not just a serious trip manager though... she still loves to come out and party with everyone! If Elle wasn’t announcing her custom colourful co-ordinated day sheet everyday, you think she’d be one of the travellers with you! I will never forget this trip and I can’t wait to go back!

Very enjoyable tour, exceptionally well led and organised, and managed to see and do a lot in the time we were there. Great food. The itinerary is quite compact, if it were up to me they’d skip Nha Trang and spend more time in Hanoi or include a day trip to Ninh Binh.

Talia is a passionate guide, who spent the whole of our trip caring for our trip group and letting us know all the intricate details of the culture and areas we visited in Vietnam.

A pleasure to be with and would recommend anyone to join her trips - I'll definitely be back!

Talia was amazing trip manager, so fun and always know what she was talking about. She always made sure I was okay and the group. 
Talia was definitely a big part of my Vietnam experience!!!!

I had an absolutely fantastic time on my Vietnam Experience tour in May. The itinerary is jam packed with a great range of activities to give you a taste of everything Vietnam. It pushed me out of my comfort zone several times which was good for me, and go me trying new foods, doing different activities, etc. The accommodation was fine and in good locations when we were staying in the bigger cities. It’s the been Contiki tour I’ve been on - I was blessed with the best group and our tour guide Talia made it even better. She was great fun, had awesome relationships with the local guides, and always made sure we’re having a great time - even when things weren’t going as expected (weather in Ha Long Bay almost changed our junk boat plans!). Highly recommend!
I couldn't have asked for a better guide - Talia was so knowledgeable and friendly. You could tell how much she enjoyed her job and her enjoyment rubbed off on everyone else.
Fi was awesome. She was always in a good mood and knew all about the trip. I would travel with her again immediately.

Trip was amazing and well organised. Fi really knew her stuff and I didn't doubt her at any point, I trusted her completely (a big acheivement from me). Fi kept our spirits high and our eyes open, I really hope to get Fi as a guide on another trip! Miss you Fi! ❤ - Hannah

Fiona was an exceptional tour guide. Her energy and enthusiasm for every day and activity was infectious. No problem was too large to help with. She has made this trip extremely memorable and ensured I will return on a contiki tour to another destination very soon. Thanks Fi !xx
Super fun & organised Fi always so helpful with anything.
Such a better experience compared to my first contiki
Had such a great time on the Vietnam experience, would highly recommend!!
Aaron has good knowledge of Vietnam, he knew exactly where to go, what was good to eat, where was good to drink! Was a great trip

Best Contiki I've ever been on (out of 4)! The TM made sure everyone was comfortable and felt safe. Definitely helped that the group we had were an amazing bunch. Exceeded my expectations and made me want to go back to Vietnam straight away. Itinerary, organisation and locations were perfect.

From the get go the entire trip was mindblowing. I'll honestly never forget the experience and the friends I made along the way for the rest of my life. None of it would have been possible without the amazing tour guides and the even more outstanding tour manager Rhi Zaa, who worked tirelessly to make sure that everyone was having the best time possible. Rhi, you the real MVP. The only downside was having to come home and leave it all behind.

Had an absolute ball on this trip! I’ve done a lot of organised tours and Rhi is by far the best tour guide I’ve had! She is so organised and knowledgeable! She’s super fun, super friendly, super easy going.. nothing was a problem for her! The trip would not have been the same with out having her there! 
She is so great at what she does!

The Vietnam Experience tour was a total  immersion into Vietnam culture, food and history, and great nights out!  On the tour we had the best gang of people. The general mood of the tour was always humorous, happy  and chill thanks to James unique ability to be a leader, a friend and just a very cool guy. The trip wouldn't  have been the same without him.

James is absolutely amazing!! He truly cares about the comfort and happiness of his tour group and is consistently checking in with everyone to ensure everyone is having the best experience possible. James knows exactly how to read the mood of a group and is full of excellent recommendations for down time on a trip. Not only is he able to control a group but he also is willing to join in and have fun! Would love to take another trip with him in the future!

james definitely made the trip one to remember, i couldn't fault him.
the trip did feel a little rushed at times but to be expected and if i could change one thing it would be to remove mekong delta from the itinerary and add an extra night in halong bay
Amazing trip, great tour guide, great group, comprehensive itinerary and good recommendations for what to do in spare time
What an amazing experience, shout out to James who did all the work so I could just enjoy myself
Excellent tour, James was an amazing tour leader. Really great experience
This tour was amazing! Great itinerary and transport. James was the best tour guide, so happy with the overall experience!
Everywhere James took us to eat and drink was well thought out! I also loved the activities! Especially the bike ride through Hoi An.
I literally had the time of my life. From the place itself to the everyone I was travelling with. Honestly cannot fault anything. would highly recommend this trip to anyone.
Elle is the best tour guide and made travelling through Asia an awesome experience! Definitely booking my next trip throughout Asia with Elle!!!

Jelly is an absolute diamond, she made our experience unrepeatable. Her emotion and passion for travel extends to everyone who is fortunate enough to spend time with her. While her calm and fun attitude makes you feel completely at home in a new surrounding.
It was my first trip abroad with my now fiancée and it will be a beautiful experience that we carry through our life with one and other.
Jelly is a fantastic tour guide! She made everyone feel comfortable and included.

Yelitza “Jelly” is the best tour guide she is so caring and genuinely wants you to have the best time while on holidays. She is very knowledgeable about south east Asia. She takes us to great places and also gives great recommendations for food , activities, where to shop, best bars to go too etc. she leaves all her travellers at the end of the tour happy!!
Once-in-a-lifetime experience led by Jelly, who was so much fun, so passionate about her job, and led us through 12 days in Vietnam seamlessly.
Jelly is an awesome guide! She knows her stuff which makes exploring a new country more enjoyable! 10/10!

Jelly was a one of a kind tour guide. Having done several other Contiki tours previously I knew what to expect but to say Jelly went over and above what was required is an understatement. Not only was she knowledgeable about local activities, lingo and cultural expectations, she ensured we were always well prepared, safe and most of all ensured we all had the best time possible. She always sought out different options  to cater for everyone’s needs (where possible). She was also the life of the party when it came to nights out and was always there to greet you with a smile in the morning. Jelly made my visit to Vietnam an unforgettable one, and has raised the bar for all future tour guides!!
Elle is simply amazing! She goes above and beyond for all her travellers no matter what time of day it is. Wish I could have her on every trip I go on!
Having Elle as my tour guide simply made my first experience in Asia an incredible and memorable time. Always there for us, very patient, knowledgeable and friendly, what else could I ask more?!
Had a great time throughout the entire trip. Eleanor was awesome and added a huge amount of value to the satisfaction of the trip.
Elle was so lovely, I could not have asked for a better tour guide! The trip was so enjoyable and she made it even more so! Always so helpful and full of information! Thank you! x

It was an amazing trip and Eleanor was the greatest guide you could ever ask for! Forever grateful for her vibrant personality and her patient nature. 

Thank you thank you thank you!

The Vietnam Experience trip was amazing in itself, from start to finish. What made the trip extra special, and so much more memorable, was Eleanor as our trip manager. She was approachable, fun and caring, and knew the county and its cities so well. Eleanor went above and beyond to make sure everyone was comfortable and having fun, and was wonderful at assisting travellers who were experiencing various difficulties on trip. It was very clear that Eleanor is so passionate about her work and her career.

I had the most amazing time on this tour with Elle! I can’t thank her enough. You can just tell Elle’s passion and love for Asia from the way she carefully plans out everyday, tells us all the most incredible facts about Asia and most importantly takes us to all the best local eateries so we can get an authentic Asian experience 

If I could rate more than 5 stars I definitely would :)

name: Vintage Vietnam

reviews.review: Phat was the perfect guide, knowledgeable, caring, approachable, responsible and entertaining.

Great itinerary but wished it included hill tribes north of Hanoi. Rest was excellent. Especially liked Ha Long Bay and Hoi An. Saw beautiful sunset through cabin window in Ha Long Bay and had a shirt and pants tailored in Hoi An. People in the group were great and there were only seven total. Excellent, friendly, helpful tour guide - Jolie.

Went with my Mother for her 60th Birthday & we had a great time. Our guide, Phat was super friendly, helpful and knowledgeable. The accommodations were all top notch and a great medium paced trip, not too rushed through, we had time to really take in each place. Small group of only 7 of us and we all had a great time got along really well so it was a very relaxed & fun trip all round!

This was a trip of a lifetime for me! The hotel and transportation arrangements were seamless and Tho made every effort to accommodate the various needs of the group (including making arrangements to meet me in the Mekong Delta since I joined the group a day late). He was patient and very knowledgeable about the history of the cities, towns, temples, and pagodas we visited.  He led us carefully through busy streets filled with motorbikes and walked us through colorful street markets brimming with all kinds of fruit, fish, meats, and vegetables. And what a delight to meet and dine with local families and take advantage of the optional tours, like biking through rice paddies outside Hoi An and sea kayaking in Halong Bay! Thank you for an experience I will always remember with joy and delight!

name: Best of Vietnam

reviews.review: I was very impressed with our group leader.She was very passionate about showing the group her country and also spending extra time with us As a group.
Well rounded trip,getting to meet the locals and experience how they live. Had a great guide who was very informed and was able to provide great insight for all the areas we travelled to.
Our guide Nga was the greatest.
Variety of activities, great experiences and an amazing tour leader.

I love intrepid because it makes traveling so easy. They take care of all the small aspects of traveling that can be hard to do in a foreign country such as transportation, language translation, meals, and safety. I felt like having a native Vietnamese guide was very beneficial.
Good experience of the country
Trip was packed with adventures and well organized!Our tour leader, Tan, was attentive, knowledgeable and helpful in all ways.Good value and we saw and did many varied activities.

The locations covered on the trip were well planned. The tour guide provided by intrepid was very attentive and knowledgeable. This in combination with hitting the key locations of Vietnam make for a fantastic trip.
Our guide had excellent knowledge of each location we went to and was able to assist us with anything we need. The trip wasn’t rushed it to slow we had a great time.

Had the most absolutely fantastic time, the Intrepid guide made it even better with his vast knowledge of everything. Very educational, exciting, informative, different, just wonderful. Thank you Intrepid

name: Central Vietnam Culinary Tour

reviews.review:
Top Vietnam Travel was an incredible company. The husband of mine and I applied them for our incredible honeymoon in Vietnam just where we traveled the length as well as breathing of the gorgeous state.
Top Vietnam Travel ensured we had been well looked after with stellar accommodation and excellent drivers. They were able to fit all we were after into the itinerary of ours.

name: Treasure of Vietnam (North to South)

reviews.review: [Original Text] Nous étions en groupe au mois de novembre. Organisation, choix d'hôtels impeccable. Je recommande cette agence.

An excellent tour with an assortment of activities that are great. All of the accommodation was comfortable and clean. The tour guide of ours was beneficial and we didn't need to be worried about anything whenever we were away as things are currently organized. I'd highly recommend the trip !!!!

The very best trip to Vietnam! It was an incredible journey with an incredible tour guide. The favorite day of mine from the journey was Halong and also the accommodation there's quite good. I'd certainly recommend this particular trip to anyone!

Vietnam Top Travel was very amazing, I actually enjoyed each activity. From the terminal pickup to assist in arranging a taxi to the terminal, in the end, every second was planned extremely well and everybody was in a position to unwind and genuinely appreciate all that Vietnam is offering. In case you're anxious about traveling or going by yourself, do not be! Everything is organized for yourself and the group leaders of yours make anyone feel very comfortable ^_^

Really well-organized tour, well designed, confident aircon automobiles or maybe vans, all guides really enjoyable & helpful.
I am going to recommend the company of yours to the friends of mine.

We booked a 2 week journey steer with Top Vietnam Travel.
They had been extremely helpful. The arrangements had been detailed and accurate. The drivers were polite and punctual. The guide supplied was knowledgeable and helpful.
We will make use of them for any later visits to Asia.

name: Highlights Of Vietnam

reviews.review: Tour guides both in Vietnam and Cambodia were very knowledgeable about their countries, both were friendly, helpful and courteous. Hotels were all excellent and great amenities such as pools. With the heat in the high 30's it was nice to have a refreshing dip. All included insights were fabulous and I manage two of the 5 optional tours which I was very happy with. The transporting between cities was done as a family as there were only 23...a nice group. All in all I would take another Trafalgar tour !
Tour was fantastic with many included World Heritage sights !
Loved this tour, lots of interaction with the locals, sightseeing, shopping, hotels were excellent, overall a wonderful experience, would thoroughly recommend.

name: Hello Vietnam

reviews.review:
They made my trip around Vietnam more expectation. They were extremely knowledgable and were able to answer every question. Taking us out of the normal tourist-packed areas around the real authentic Vietnam. Thank You Top Vietnam Travel for a wonderful trip.
❤

We'd the best incredible time, all were considered in advance as well as nothing was excessive difficulty for the guides as well as drivers we utilized. I'd definitely suggest this particular company to anyone going to Vietnam and would like to see the sights.

I have just finished the essential Vietnam tour with these guys! Our hotels were amazing. The Halong Bay overnight cruise was pretty impressive. Very very good value for money and met lovely travelers along the way. I highly recommend and will use them again on my next trip to Vietnam.

I thoroughly enjoyed our trip to Vietnam. It was so well organized, it gave us total peace of mind to enjoy our trip knowing everything was taken care off. Our guides and drivers were all wonderful. I would highly recommend your service to family or friends thinking of traveling to Vietnam.

The really incredible trip and watched anything I might have wanted while being surrounded by excellent people and accommodation! The company was impeccable and I never ever had to hesitate about what I had to do. It absolutely was a fantastic combination of awesome activities as particularly on several hidden diamonds. We'd an amazing team and a fantastic manual with an ideal sense of all of us. THANK you for each second we'd!

I cannot suggest this company more. We spent two weeks visiting Vietnam in the care of theirs with a self-directed tour. It was fantastic. The manuals, drivers, and hotels have been excellent. They actually surprised me on the birthday of mine with dinner, a card, and wine. I will pick them to travel down the road!

The exceptional excursion organized by Top Vietnam Travel, by Ms. Cathy. We gave her twelve days to prepare, and what a brilliant journey - Hanoi, Nha Trang, Hoi An, and also the Mekong Delta. Great English speaking manuals, with a detailed understanding of Vietnam, do's and don't.

name: Vietnam Highlights

reviews.review: Jules was incredible! So friendly from the start automatically making me feel settled in. Everything was so perfectly organised and she knew something about everything. She also ensured if we needed help with anything at all she was there for us.

Absolutely brilliant tour manager! Made this tour a great experience and very knowledgeable about Vietnam’s history! Definitely knows how to show you a good time as well! 
Great guy, anyone would be lucky to meet him!

Stef really knows his stuff and is a superb tour manager. He gave real insight into the history, culture and traditions - all while managing a variety of characters on the tour.

There were some more in depth questions about social economicals & Vietnam’s history with other countries that he answered with conviction & quality

I’d be more than happy to be on any tour group that he manages. Money well spent.
Was an excellent tour of a beautiful country. It ran smoothly, I’d highly recommend it.

Absolutely loved Jelly! Legendary tour guide, keen to share her knowledge of the local area and happy to help so always ended up going the extra mile! Probably would have gotten lost on my last two solo days in Hanoi without Jelly’s advice and phone number!

Jelly made every step of the journey so so easy! From getting us to know each other straight away with a treasure hunt in Ho Chi Minh City to getting to know each of our interests and dietary needs so she could make it the best experience possible. The way she personalised each of the daily itineraries made us even more excited for what was to come. Whenever she didn't know something we asked, Jelly made it her business to find someone who did!

Jelly is such a nice person that even when the trip was over, our friendship continued. When Jelly herself came to Ireland, we met up in Dublin! And because of her skills in getting a big group to mingle, I am writing this review from South Africa right now as I am visiting a friend I made on Jelly's Vietnam trip!

Jelly was upbeat and friendly from the start. She made everyone feel comfortable! 
I enjoyed the itinerary and free time add ons! Accomodation was beyond my expectations, clean and great locations!

Jelly is one of the best and kind tour guides. I’d never been on a contiki before and she made the expierence so enjoyable. It was an amazing trip, I have met so many beautiful people from around the world who I’ll know for the rest of my life. The places in Vietnam we went to we’re incredbile. It is a short trip, but has given me ideas when I go back to Vietnam where I would. I went to a lot of different places, which I might not of gone to if I was just traveling solo or with friends. 
Jelly is so down to earth, and always so much Fun. I would love to do another Tour with her ❤️✨
El was a great guide, extremely passionate about her job and very knowledgeable. Also more than happy to help with any questions or recommendations.

Elle was the perfect guide. Her knowledge of the areas, ability to both get along with and manage the whole group, and unwavering ability to make the best of every situation made the trip an incredible experience.
Ell was amazing. Such a friendly face and took us to some amazing spots
It was amazing! James went all out to make every part of the trip spectacular and memorable. Traveling became my passion.

James made that trip. He was an incredible manager. Give him a promotion I love him
So much. I get anxiety traveling and made me feel comfortable the entire time and was a wealth of knowledge. Could not have asked for a better manager

I Would love to travel with Talia again, she made the trip a dream come true. Talia managed the group dynamics awesomely her incredible skills in people management allowed her to encourage everyone on the tour to engage, by the end of the tour it felt like we were a great big family. If you are lucky enough to travel with Talia you can guarantee that she will take the time to get to know you and play a big part in the amazing memories that you make.
Sam was a brilliant tour guide, very knowledgeable and good fun!
An amazing tour with an even better guide! Eb was fantastic. The accommodation and transportation was far better than I ever thought. Such a great tour to get an overview of this amazing country.
Great trip. Everything was organised well. Group size was ideal, not too big or too small

Greg, Vietnam and whiskers on kittens. These are a few of my favourite things! What an adventure to begin my year with. I couldn’t have asked for a better holiday. Vietnam accomodation was well above what I expected, I was a two star girl living in a five star world.
The trip surpassed all expectations!

Greg was able to provide an excellent review on accommodation, restaurants, bars and the history of where we stayed. He was also able to stick to achedukrs tightly, as well as making my first overseas trip the best adventure I’ve ever been on!
Greg was awesome, really great in depth understanding of the culture and countriy and with a knack for passing that knowledge along to the group in a fun way
Greg was amazing! Very informative and helped us out a lot even with what to do when we had free time. Something that I found a few contiki tour guides don't do

I had an injury whilst in tour and Mahn arranged an upgrade for us to make me comfortable having to miss a day trip. I thank him for his care with this. The sight seeing trips arranged for us were great too. Good English speaking and variety to give us taste of Vietnam. However, thought for short time, first time to Vietnam, it was easy to have independence of dates but everything arranged for us. Definitely worth the price to know good research has been done by to our manager having knowledge and communication with all hotels and drivers already. Small price to pay. Thank you so much, Mahn. reviews.review:
An excellent tour (19 days with Sim card Hanoi to HoChi Minh)
Very busy. Perhaps a day for testing is a good idea as someone has already suggested.
Enjoyed Sapa 2days excursion. Our guide Lee was excellent. Very good English (best of every guide) and very informative about district and Vietnamese culture. Good train journeys.
The day from Hue to Quang Bihn Paradise cave was too long and we would have preferred to visit DMZ Zone and Vihn Moc Tunnels instead.
Bit disappointed at 4 Isand trip from NhaTrang. Only 1 beach with good sand.
Most things went to plan. Left a couple of times wondering if pick up would arrive but a quick message to Ms Lan and everything was sorted. 
Highly recommended.

This tour was a FANTASTIC way to cover a lot of Vietnam!
99% of the Guides we had take care of us were brilliant (you have a different guide/group of fellow travellers each day). Great English. There was only one Guide whose English was difficult to understand which made learning about the Farmers hard.
95% of the time the Drivers arrived on time, or earlier (up to 30 minutes earlier in some cases so it's wise to be ready 30 minutes before the quoted pick up time).
There were a couple of Drivers that were late to pick us up (twice from the Train station/s & once from Dalat Airport), however, no matter the time, we were able to call Ms Lan using the local SIM provided, & Ms Lan would have it sorted within 20 minutes, max (be sure to take an 'unlocked' mobile phone with you).
The included activities & daily tours were AWESOME!
The included meals were sometimes a challenge for a Vegetarian, but were always sorted out.
For the overnight train/s, I would suggest upgrading to book the WHOLE cabin to yourselves (if you are a couple travelling together).
It is very 'cosy' for 4 adults... especially if you do not know the other 2 that you are sharing the cabin with (or your bag/s are on the larger size).
The only suggestion I would make for Vietnam Adventure Tours would be to break up the 19 day tour with a couple of days 'rest'.
19 days of early starts, long days & high heat (April is the hottest month to travel in Vietnam) made it a tiring tour, BUT, it was very satisfying to see & do so much!
If the tour was a 21 day tour, with 2 days of rest (one of those rest days would be good in Nha Trang as the beaches are gorgeous) it would be perfect!
We added 3 days at the beginning, & 8 days at the end of the tour which helped us ease into Vietnam, & relax after the tour, which I highly recommend if you have the time.
If you are limited for time, I would suggest arriving at least the day before the tour start date, & departing at least the day after the tour ends.
Overall, I would give this tour a 9/10.
Ms Lan was a true professional (even when I called her at 4:50am to locate our late Driver!), friendly & made our tour a wonderful experience.
HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

reviews.review:

All happened so seamlessly as organised by Mahn which took any stress out of bookings to fit within 15 day stay without visa. The hotels booked on the tour by Mahn were thoughtfully located to explore areas and of the best quality. I had an injury whilst in tour and Mahn arranged an upgrade for us to make me comfortable having to miss a day trip. I thank him for his care with this. The sight seeing trips arranged for us were great too. Good English speaking and variety to give us taste of Vietnam. I normally arrange all components of a journey when travelling lots in SE Asia, to save cost. However, thought for short time, first time to Vietnam, it was easy to have independence of dates but everything arranged for us. Definitely worth the price to know good research has been done by to our manager having knowledge and communication with all hotels and drivers already. Small price to pay. Thank you so much, Mahn. reviews.review: Guides were very friendly and welcoming. Tour bus from Hanoi to port was relatively new, clean and comfortable. Boat like many others in the bay was fairly old and a bit run down. Had a great view from the top deck. The lock on our room broke and we needed to be moved to another room, the shower in the new room did not drain water so well. The tour packed in a lot of activities over the three days including a cave visit and hike up Ti Top island. Expect to pay for all drinks on the boat and corkage fee to bring your own drinks. Cat Ba island hotel was nice with a great view of the harbour and only a short walk to town. The hike included on Cat Ba was quite strenuous but the view from the top of the mountain fantastic. The trip to monkey island on a small boat off Cat Ba was cool - the monkeys can get a bit agitated, and are experts at raiding back packs, zippers pose no problem for them. Overall a lot of fun was had on the tour and it was well organised and the guides kept the group busy.

The tour was a great overview of the life and industry on the Mekong Delta. The bus was comfortable and the tour guide very knowledgeable. It was a very on the go tour and long distances made the day tiring. We did not arrive at our homestay (we chose the homestay option - there was a hotel option) until quite late. But the homestay, while at first seeming quite isolated and off the beaten track, actually had about 25 other tourists also staying there. The highlight was the cooking lesson for dinner and then eating all we had cooked. All in all, a great overview, but long distances to travel.

The tour guide and staff were excellent. The food was good. The rooms were great. Pick ups and drop offs smooth. I can say only good things about the staff. Their sense of humor and duty to their jobs was above board. The only problem I had was with how many other tours and tourists were doing the same thing at the exact same time.
